		# 15: EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_DOM

				scope:dom_transition_0 = 15

			name = prev_event
			value = 6
		}

		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 15
			}

		}

				CHANGE = -2
			}

				value = 10015

	# FM_DEEPTHROAT: Deepthroat

				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 22
				}
			}
			# FM_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 23
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_DEEPTHROAT
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 22
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 22
				}
			}
			# FM_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 23
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 23
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 10
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 10
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 21: EventsSex.FM_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_SUB
		name = LIDAoption.21
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 21
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 21
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 7
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 21
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.6
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10021
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 22
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.7
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 23
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.3
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 22: EventsSex.FM_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.FM_DEEPTHROAT
		name = LIDAoption.22
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 22
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 22
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 7
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 22
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.7
	}
	option = {
		# 23: EventsSex.FM_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsCum.FM_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
		name = LIDAoption.23
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 23
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 23
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 7
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 0
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 23
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.3
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina <= 0
				}
				desc = root_cum_f
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = f_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = f_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = f_med_stam
			}
			desc = f_high_stam
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = pm_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {

				}
				desc = pm_med_stam
			}
			desc = pm_high_stam
		}
		desc = LIDAs.2.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 0.5
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 0.75
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes

			# FM_ASS_RUB

			value = yes

			name = partner_naked
			value = yes

LIDAs.10 = {
	# FM_ASS_RUB: Ass Rub
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.10.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}

	}
	option = {
		# 39: EventsSex.FM_HOTDOG -> EventsSex.FM_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
		name = LIDAoption.39
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 39
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 39
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 8
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 39
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.5
	}
	option = {
		# 40: EventsSex.FM_HOTDOG -> EventsCum.FM_ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.40
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 40
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 40
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 8
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 40
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.6
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10040
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 38
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.9
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 39
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.5
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 41
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.7
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 41: EventsSex.FM_HOTDOG -> EventsCum.FM_CUM_ON_GROIN
		name = LIDAoption.41
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 41
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 41
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 8
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 0
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 41
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.7
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

		}

			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10046
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 44
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.9
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 45
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.5
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 47
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.7
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 47: EventsSex.FM_STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsCum.FM_CUM_ON_GROIN
		name = LIDAoption.47
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 47
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 47

			CHANGE = 0
		}

			value = 47
		}

	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}

					value = 53
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 7
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 7
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = root_naked
			value = yes
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 48: EventsSex.FM_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.48
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 48
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 48
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 5
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 48
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.4
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10048
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 50
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.5
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 51
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.14
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 53
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.9
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 49: EventsSex.FM_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_SUB
		name = LIDAoption.49
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 49
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 49
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 5

		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = dom_success_adjustment
			value = 1
		}
		custom_tooltip = dom_success_adjustment_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance

				CHANGE = 1
			}

				value = 49

			}

			}

				limit = {

				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.9
			}
		}

			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}

		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}

			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}

			# FM_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 56
				}
			}

			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 57
				}
			}

			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 60
				}
			}

			# FM_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 56
					}

					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 56
				}

					NOT = {

					}

					value = 57

				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 60
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 60
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 15
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 15
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = root_naked
			value = yes
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 54: EventsSex.FM_REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.FM_REVERSE_COWGIRL
		name = LIDAoption.54
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 54
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 54
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 11
		}

			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 54
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.11
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}

				name = sex_transition
				value = 10054
			}

				}

			}

				}

			}

				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.9
			}

			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}

		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes

			# FM_COWGIRL
			10 = {

					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}

	option = {
		# 61: EventsSex.FM_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.FM_COWGIRL
		name = LIDAoption.61

			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 61
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 61
			}
		}

			name = prev_event
			value = 12
		}

			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 61
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.12
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}

				name = sex_transition
				value = 10061
			}

			}

			}

			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}

	# FM_MISSIONARY: Lie on Back
	type = character_event

		}
		event_background = battlefield

			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10075
				}
				# 75: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.FM_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND failed
				# You try to find a moment to pull your knees under you, but each attempt is thwarted by his wild thrashing.\n
				desc = sex_transition_75.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10077
				}
				# 77: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.FM_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# "D-Don't fill me!" you shakingly say as his pounding nearly drives you senseless, but your pleas falls on deaf ears.\n
				desc = sex_transition_77.10000
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 5
			}
			# defaulted to 51: EventsSex.FM_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE
			desc = sex_transition_51.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 11
			}
			# defaulted to 57: EventsSex.FM_REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE
			desc = sex_transition_57.0
		}

			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 13
			}
			# defaulted to 70: EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY -> EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE

		}

			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 14
			}
			# defaulted to 76: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE
			desc = sex_transition_76.0
		}

			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina <= 0
				}
				desc = root_cum_f
			}

					scope:root_stamina < 2

				}
				desc = f_med_stam
			}
			desc = f_high_stam
		}

			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = pm_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = pm_low_stam
			}

				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = pm_med_stam
			}
			desc = pm_high_stam

			}
			desc = LIDAs.14.desc.1
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAs.14.desc.2
		}
		desc = LIDAs.14.desc.3
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 3.5
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 2.5
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# FM_MISSIONARY
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 74
				}
			}
			# FM_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND

					value = 75
				}

				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 77
				}
			}

			# FM_MISSIONARY
			10 = {

					NOT = {

					}

				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 74
				}
			}

	option = {
		# 74: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY
		name = LIDAoption.74
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 74
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 74
			}

			name = prev_event
			value = 14
		}

		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 74
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.13
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10074
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 76
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.14
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 78
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.11
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}

		# 75: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.FM_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND

			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}

		animation = idle

				no_clothes
			}
		}

		character = scope:affairs_partner

				exists = scope:partner_naked

			}

		}

			# MF_HANDJOB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}

					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 79
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}

					value = 80
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 5
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 79: EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB
		name = LIDAoption.79
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 79
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 79
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 15
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 79
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.17
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10079
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 80
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.18
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 80: EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.80
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 80
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 80
			}
		}

			name = prev_event
			value = 15
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 80
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.18
	}

		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}

	# MF_HANDJOB: Handjob
	type = character_event

LIDAs.18 = {
	# MF_BLOWJOB_DOM: Dom Blowjob
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.18.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {

	option = {
		# 86: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB
		name = LIDAoption.86
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 86
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 86
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 18
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 86
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.17
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10086
			}

				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 88
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.20
			}

					scope:sub_transition_0 = 89
				}

				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.14
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 92
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.16
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 87: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.87
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 87
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 87
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 18
		}

		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 0
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 87
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.18
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10087
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 88
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.20
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 89
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.19
			}

				trigger_event = LIDAc.14
			}

				trigger_event = LIDAc.16
			}

				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.19
			}

			}

				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.16
			}
		}

			limit = {

			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 93
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.18
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10093
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 94
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.20
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 95
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.21
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 97
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.15
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 98
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.16
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 94: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB
		name = LIDAoption.94
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 94
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 94
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 20
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 94
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.20
	}
	option = {
		# 95: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT
		name = LIDAoption.95
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 95
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 95
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 20
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 95
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.21
	}
	option = {
		# 96: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.MF_HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND
		name = LIDAoption.96
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 96
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 96
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 20
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 96
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.13
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10096
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 94
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.20
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 95
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.21
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 97
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.15
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 98
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.16
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 97: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
		name = LIDAoption.97
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 97
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 97
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 20
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 0
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 97
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.15
	}
	option = {
		# 98: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_ON_FACE
		name = LIDAoption.98
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 98
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 98
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 20
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 0
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 98
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.16
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}
LIDAs.21 = {
	# MF_DEEPTHROAT: Deepthroat
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.21.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {

		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = throne_room_kneel_2
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 95
				}
				# Sub Blowjob
				# He takes advantage of your lack of strong resistance to dominate your mouth further. Trapping your head with his hands, he plunges deeper while you gag.\n
				desc = sex_transition_95.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 100
				}
				# Deepthroat
				# He continues fucking your throat while your vision blurs against a mixture of tears, saliva, and sex juices.\n
				desc = sex_transition_100.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10093
				}
				# 93: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you attempt to curb his thrusts. However, on your knees beneath him, you don't have enough leverage to forcefully stop him and he seems to have no intention of letting you back in control.\n
				desc = sex_transition_93.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10096
				}
				# 96: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.MF_HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND failed
				# Try as you might, [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] stops you from pulling away.\n
				desc = sex_transition_96.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10099
				}
				# 99: EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you push and try to stop his thrusts. It's all in vain, however, as he ignores you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_99.10000
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 20
			}
			# defaulted to 95: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT
			desc = sex_transition_95.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 21
			}
			# defaulted to 100: EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT
			desc = sex_transition_100.0
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = m_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = m_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = m_med_stam
			}
			desc = m_high_stam
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				desc = partner_cum_f
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = pf_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = pf_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = pf_med_stam
			}
			desc = pf_high_stam
		}
		desc = LIDAs.21.desc.0
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				NOT = { has_trait = lida_sub }
			}
			desc = LIDAs.21.desc.1
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAs.21.desc.2
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 2.0
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 1.0
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# MF_BLOWJOB_SUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 99
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_DEEPTHROAT
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 100
				}
			}
			# MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 101
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_DEEPTHROAT
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 100
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 100
				}
			}
			# MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 101
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 101
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 10
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 10
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 99: EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB
		name = LIDAoption.99
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 99
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 99
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 21
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 99
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.20
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10099
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 100
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.21
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 101
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.15
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 100: EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT
		name = LIDAoption.100
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 100
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 100
			}
		}

			name = prev_event
			value = 21
		}

		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 100
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.21
	}
	option = {
		# 101: EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsCum.MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
		name = LIDAoption.101
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 101
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 101
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 21
		}

		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 0
		}

			name = sex_transition
			value = 101
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.15
	}

		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}

	# MF_ASS_TEASE: Ass Tease

		}

		event_background = sitting_room

		}

			}

			}

					scope:partner_stamina < 2
				}

			}

			value = {

				add = 0
			}
		}

			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 102
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.24
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}

				name = sex_transition
				value = 10102
			}

				trigger_event = LIDAs.22
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 106
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.19
			}
		}

			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}

			add_internal_flag = special
		}

				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 108
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS
			10 = {
				trigger = {

					}

					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 110
				}

					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}

				value = -1
			}

	immediate = {

LIDAs.23 = {
	# MF_STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND: Fingered from Behind
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.23.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = temple
	}

		}

		}

		}
		event_background = courtyard

		}
		event_background = feast

		}
		event_background = market

		}

		}

		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}

		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}

				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}

			trigger = {

			}

			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 116
				}
				# Get Hotdogged

		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}

LIDAs.25 = {

			}

			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance

			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 132
			}

			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 136
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.20
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10136
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 134
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.19
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 135
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.28
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 138
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.21
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 137: EventsSex.MF_REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_ON_TOP
		name = LIDAoption.137
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 137
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 137
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 25
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 137
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.22
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10137
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 134
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.19
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 135
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.28
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 138
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.21
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 138: EventsSex.MF_REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_REGULAR
		name = LIDAoption.138
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 138
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 138
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 25
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 138
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.21
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 141: EventsSex.MF_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.MF_HOTDOG
		name = LIDAoption.141
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 141
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 141
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 26
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 141
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.22
	}
	option = {
		# 142: EventsSex.MF_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.MF_MISSIONARY
		name = LIDAoption.142
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 142
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 142
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 26
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 142
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.27
	}
	option = {
		# 143: EventsSex.MF_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.MF_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.143
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 143
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 143
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 26
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 143
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.20
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10143
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 141
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.22
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 142
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.27
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 145
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.21
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 144: EventsSex.MF_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_ON_TOP
		name = LIDAoption.144
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 144
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 144
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 26
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 144
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.22
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10144
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 141
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.22
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 142
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.27
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 145
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.21
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 145: EventsSex.MF_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_REGULAR
		name = LIDAoption.145
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 145
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 145
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 26
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 145
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.21
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 148
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.28
	}
	option = {
		# 149: EventsSex.MF_MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.MF_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.149
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 149
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 149
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 27
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 149
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.20
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10149
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 147
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.27
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 148
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.28
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 150
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.23
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 150: EventsSex.MF_MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_BREED
		name = LIDAoption.150
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 150
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 150
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 27
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 150
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.23
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 153
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.28
	}
	option = {
		# 154: EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.MF_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.154
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 154
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 154
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 28
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 154
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.20
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10154
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 153
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.28
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 155
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.23
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 155: EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_BREED
		name = LIDAoption.155
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 155
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 155
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 28
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 155
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.23
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}
